ComicInfo.Summary:
In this issue, Concrete convinces Larry to watch his favorite late-night show, Sky of Heads, a popular cable program that contemplates the meaning and existence of the afterlife. Written and illustrated by Paul Chadwick.
Doom Patrol artist Gary Martin concludes his first work as writer/artist with Captain Crusader! In this final episode, Captain Crusader discovers what the harsh reality of being a "super hero" really is!
ComicInfo.Title: A Sky of Heads: With a Whimper; Captain Crusader Chapter III; When the Old World Was New
ComicInfo.Writer: Gary Davis,Gary Martin,Paul Chadwick,Paul Chadwick,Gary Martin,Gary Davis
